ComicInfo.Series: Itty Bitty Hellboy: The Search for the Were-Jaguar
ComicInfo.Summary:
Hellboy delivers the underwear to Roger but things don't work out as planned.
While Hellboy and Liz rendezvous with Kate, Lobster Johnson has followed Karl and Rasputin to the island.
Karl and Rasputin have followed Hellboy to Roger's island where they hope to photograph the elusive Were-Jaguar, but they are captured by a band of homunculi.
Hellboy and Liz travel to visit Roger and his fellow homunculi and to bring them some underwear.
